title: Feature Proposal Template
description: Use this template to propose new features for SasWatch. AI agents can create proposals, but only humans can approve them.

template.title: Feature Title
template.problem: What problem does this solve? Be specific about user pain points.
template.solution: How will this feature solve the problem? Describe the approach.
userStories: As a [role], I want [feature] so that [benefit]
template.marketJustification: Why is this important based on market trends or competitive analysis?

statusFlow.in-progress: AI or human actively working on it

rules.humanApprovalRequired: for any feature touching protected files
